release.change: Updated PTE: This enables "Find Nearby Stations" feature for many providers
Fix issue with BVG provider (new API base)
Do not crash on autocompletion like sometimes with VRR provider
Station position is now shown in calendar export and shared trip text
Long press on products now shows their name
Special connection messages are shown in red and without HTML code
Updated PTE: Added support for Rostock (RSAG), fixed encoding errors in auto-completion, fewer departures shown
Favorite locations, trips and your home needed to be reset :(
The favorite trips list has been improved
You can now share trips via SMS or email
You can add trips directly into your calendar
Show walking between stations on external map app
Show nearby stations on map
Choose the products you want to use for your trip (Thanks to MRay for the icons)
You can now pull to refresh the list of next departures
Removed Region: Maribor, Bremen
Added Region: Jerusalem, Dubai, Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur, Göttingen & South Lower Saxony
Added Italian Translation (Thanks to Giuseppe Pignataro)
New start screen
Find trips from current position
New home button as a shortcut for your home station, long press to change later
+15 minutes button to quickly change time for trip
Wider input field for location/station name
Input fields for stations now have a X button to delete the text
Names in the auto completion lists now also show the city of the proposed location (Thanks to Michael Kesper)
Hide less used settings from start screen
Action Bar button to show less used settings
Little trip boxes are now shown in correct order (Thanks to Sam Tuke)
Added support for NVV (Hessen, Kassel) (Thanks to Paspartout)
Added suport for Wiener Linien (Wien)
Fix crash for certain connections without line style (Thanks to Paspartout)
Added third tab for stations
Find next departures from given station
Find nearby stations (from current position) and their next departures
Remember whether you want to see the train platform or not
Show actual error messages if a search goes wrong
Added French Translation (Thanks to @Mina_Vidar)
Fixed bug #13 crash for walking-only connections
Fixed bug #10 crash when searching in airplane mode
Trips can now be marked as favorites and be accessed by swiping right in the main screen or by using the new tab bar
Automatically show connection delays (alpha!)
Add button to show/hide platforms where trains will arrive/depart
Button to swap From and To location
Show changelog after updates and add menu option to show full changelog
Added German Translation (Thanks to Martin Riesner)
First release
